name: 3D Book of Mormon Infinite Run FREE
name_original: 3D Book of Mormon Infinite Run FREE
description:
++++++BEST LDS GAME ON THE PLANET!!!!++++++
****************************************************************************************************************
See your favorite BOM characters come to life in this ADDICTING infinite runner game!!!!!
****************************************************************************************************************
Choose from Nephi, Moroni, and many more characters as you run through awesome Book of Mormon scenes, collect coins and power-ups and overcome near-impossible challenges!!!!!

REVIEWS:
"This game is really cool. REALLY. It's the funnest LDS game I've found." -Kristy P.
"Church mode is awesome. Enough said. " -Jared A.
"This game is insanely fun!!!! And Addicting!!!" -Jacob T.

GAME FEATURES:
-Awesome BOM Characters to Choose From
-Amazing BOM Graphics
-Collect Coins and Power-ups
-Complete Challenges and Win Extra Coins
-Run,Jump,and slide over Obstalces!
-Much, much, more!!!!!!

Download TODAY and see why the LDS world is buzzing about this game!!!
